streaming.guidance: Some violent scenes from the start and throughout

episodes.shortSummary: When a man is found dead with a stake through his heart, Patience seeks a logical answer
episodes.summary: When a photographer is found dead with a stake through his heart and his body drained of blood, Patience and new DI Frankie Monroe seek a logical answer to the vampire-like crime
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 1

streaming.guidance: Violent scenes from the start and throughout

episodes.shortSummary: A music student is found dead... and then her professor dies too
episodes.summary: A music student is found dead... and then her professor dies too. Patience races to unravel the mystery, leading to a showdown in York Minster. And Patience and Elliot go on their first date.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 2

streaming.guidance: Violent scenes from the start and throughout

episodes.shortSummary: A man is shot in a packed boardroom, yet no one saw the killer. Is a dead magpie a clue?
episodes.summary: A lawyer is shot dead in a packed boardroom - yet no one saw the killer. Is a dead magpie at the scene of the crime a clue for Patience and the team?
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 3

streaming.guidance: Violent scenes from the start and throughout, and scenes some viewers may find distressing

episodes.shortSummary: After witnessing her dad’s murder, can a young autistic girl lead Patience to the truth?
episodes.summary: A young autistic girl witnesses her father’s murder, and her mother goes missing, but she’s unable to tell anyone what happened. Can Patience gain her trust and uncover the truth?
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 4

streaming.guidance: Scenes of violence from the start and throughout

episodes.shortSummary: Patience races to solve the murder of a Viking expert, and her relationship hits the rocks
episodes.summary: When a Viking expert drops dead just before a big speech, Patience finds a message that hints at foul play... and then his colleague dies too. And Patience's romance with Elliot hits the rocks.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 5

streaming.guidance: Scenes of violence from the start and throughout, and drug references

episodes.shortSummary: Resentment boils over between Patience and Frankie as they investigate a botanist's death
episodes.summary: Resentment boils over between Patience and Frankie as they investigate the death of a botanist. And Jake takes Patience speed-dating.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 6

streaming.guidance: Scenes of violence from the start and throughout

episodes.shortSummary: When a monk is found dead in a chapel, unholy secrets surface at the monastery
episodes.summary: When a monk is found dead in a chapel, unholy secrets surface at the monastery. Meanwhile, Patience finds herself under the spotlight, and starts to rethink her decision about Elliot.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 7

streaming.guidance: Scenes of violence from the start and throughout, and some scenes some viewers may find distressing

episodes.shortSummary: Patience and Frankie are held at gunpoint by an escaped prisoner seeking justice
episodes.summary: Patience and Frankie are held at gunpoint by an escaped prisoner, and a figure from Frankie’s past resurfaces. Patience comes to a realisation about her feelings, and a visitor brings unexpected news.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 8

streaming.guidance: Graphic scenes from the start that some viewers may find distressing

episodes.shortSummary: When a man dies in a suspected suicide, eagle-eyed Patience spots an interesting link
episodes.summary: When a man dies after setting himself on fire in a suspected suicide, eagle-eyed Patience identifies an interesting link to other cases, bringing her to the attention of Detective Bea Metcalf
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 1

streaming.guidance: Graphic images from the start and scenes that some viewers may find distressing

episodes.shortSummary: A distressed Patience is questioned by the police after coming under suspicion
episodes.summary: A distressed Patience is questioned by the police after coming under suspicion. Bea takes Patience under her wing and learns more about her past. Together, they set to work on cracking the case.
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: The team are baffled when a young woman is found dead in a museum's dinosaur display
episodes.summary: The team are baffled when a young woman is found dead in a museum's dinosaur display. The investigation leads them into the shadowy world of fossil smuggling, and Patience makes a startling deduction.
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: When a reclusive crime writer is found dead behind locked doors, Bea needs Patience's help
episodes.summary: When a reclusive crime writer is found dead behind locked doors, Bea asks Patience to help with the investigation. Can Patience make a breakthrough in the case?
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 4

streaming.guidance: Graphic images and some violent scenes

episodes.shortSummary: Patience races against time when a body disappears from the morgue
episodes.summary: Patience races against time when a body disappears from the morgue. Is it the work of bodysnatchers - or could the victim still be alive?
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 5

streaming.guidance: Graphic images and some violent scenes

episodes.shortSummary: A man dies on a bus, and Bea refuses to stop digging - but Patience fears for her safety
episodes.summary: When a man dies on a bus, Bea is warned off the case but refuses to stop digging - and Patience fears for her safety
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 6

series.summary: Patience helps the police to tackle more puzzling crimes across York, while navigating love and loss in her personal life. But can her brilliant intuition shine alongside fiery new detective Frankie?
series.title: Series 2

series.summary: Talented autistic archivist Patience enters an unpredictable world when detective Bea spots her unique crime-solving skills
series.title: Series 1

brand.shortSummary: An offbeat detective is exiled to the mountains. Italian crime drama from Walter Presents.

brand.shortSummary: Engrossing New Zealand crime drama. Jess’s reality is shattered when her husband dies.
brand.summary: Engrossing New Zealand crime drama. After losing her husband in a car crash, Detective Jess's rigid view of justice is picked apart. Now she must face a reality that’s not so morally black and white.
brand.title: The Gulf
